ComicInfo.Summary:
When a highly successful young artist enjoying the good life can't help but gloat over his jealous rival who struggles to make ends meet things terror can't be too far behind. Envy is thought to be a sin and when this man lets it take over his life he soon learns just exactly how deadly it can be.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Gregbo Watson | 1 | B | Cover B | Noah Salonga & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | C | Cover C | Maria Laura Sanapo & Vinicius Andrade | 3 |
